Name: The House in the Forest
About the game: The House in the Forest is a short, first-person exploration game about a family who moved out to go live a lonely life. You'll play as a person who got lost on the way back to his house ends up discovering clean but an abandoned house. Features: - Discovering events of the story through the notes/diary scattered in the environment. - An exploration in a rich, detailed realistic environment. - Primarily a 'Walking-Simulator' - Environmental storytelling.
